member.name: ISyncMgrConflictStore.BindToConflict
member.summary: Binds to a particular conflict specified by IID.
member.param: A reference to a desired conflict IID.
When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictStore.EnumConflicts
member.summary: Enumerates conflicts scoped to the provided sync handler and sync item.
member.param: A pointer to the sync handler ID as a Unicode string.
A pointer to the sync item ID as a Unicode string.
The address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictStore.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of conflicts in the store.
member.param: A pointer to a sync handler ID as a Unicode string.
A pointer to a sync item ID as a Unicode string.
When this method returns, contains the conflict count.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictStore.RemoveConflicts
member.summary: Deletes a set of conflicts, specified by conflict ID, from the store.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictStore
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow a handler to provide conflicts that appear in the Conflicts folder.
